body_html: I used x64 as a flag for cmake, and then I changed to x64 in Visual Studio's Solution Platform drop down menu. Is there something else I need to change in the individual project? My solution's configuration properties says that all projects are trying to build as RelWithDebInfo x64.

body: I used x64 as a flag for cmake, and then I changed to x64 in Visual Studio's Solution Platform drop down menu. Is there something else I need to change in the individual project? My solution's configuration properties says that all projects are trying to build as RelWithDebInfo x64.
